description: This file defines data models for notes and categories within a Flutter-based note management app. It includes the NoteCategory class for categorizing notes and the core Note class, with methods for serialization, copying, and equality checks.

classes.name: NoteCategory
classes.description: Represents a note label/category with an ID, name, and creation timestamp.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Core note entity with fields for title, content, category, timestamps, and flags for archived and pinned status.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the object into a Map<String, dynamic> for storage or transmission.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor for creating an instance from a Map<String, dynamic>.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the instance with optional modifications to select fields.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a string representation of the Note object.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Overrides equality operator to compare note instances based on their properties.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Provides a hash code based on the note's properties, used in collections.
